meanings.sent1: The dark clouds betokened an approaching storm.
meanings.sent3: The chirping of birds betokened the start of a new day.
meanings.sent4: The old, creaky door betokened the passage of time.
meanings.sent5: The sudden silence betokened something amiss in the room.

meanings.sent1: The dove betokened peace in the painting.
meanings.sent2: The red rose betokened love and passion.
meanings.sent3: The ringing of the bell betokened the end of the school day.
meanings.sent4: The broken mirror betokened seven years of bad luck.
meanings.sent5: The crown betokened royalty and power in the play.
